name: Anti-Designator Freeze Projector, Advanced (AaDFPj-16)
description: Advanced version of the anti-designator freeze projector. The weapon senses the effects of a freeze designator and can be set to automatically fire or wait for a manual command to fire.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
